ValidationRule.description: Policy Number field is required when moving the status to Sold with Probability: 90%
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Administration - SB'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Manager - SB'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'PC Sales Rep - SB') ), (Probability==0.9), OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Sold - Submitted"), ISBLANK(Policy_Number__c), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"ERISA")), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"Cyber")) ),
AND( NOT(ISBLANK(Primary_Opportunity__c)), ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Sold - Submitted"), ISBLANK(Policy_Number__c), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"ERISA")), NOT(CONTAINS(TEXT(OpportunityType__c),"Cyber")) ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Policy Number field is required when moving the status to Sold with Probability: 90%
